sentence.Network_en: A distinction is often made between " positive " and " negative " eugenics.

sentence.Network_en: An example of negative eugenics would be the attempt to eradicate a harmful recessive gene.

entry.def: Eugenics is the study of methods to improve the human race by carefully selecting parents who will produce the strongest children.

means.word_mean: 1. the study of methods of improving genetic qualities by selective breeding (especially as applied to human mating)

stems_affixes.word_buile: eu好,优秀+phon声音+ious……的→声音好听的
eu好,优秀+phor带来+ia……的→带来美好→愉快
eu好,优秀+gen产出+ics学科→产生优秀[后代]→优生学
eu好,优秀+phem讲话+ism行为等→讲好话
eu好,优秀+log说+ize表动词→说好话
